name: Tech M&A
description: Comprehensive IRL template for technology company acquisitions covering SaaS, software, and digital businesses.

items.name: Audited Financial Statements (3 years)
items.description: Annual audited financial statements including balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow

items.name: Monthly Financial Reports (24 months)
items.description: Monthly P&L, balance sheet, and key metrics

items.name: Revenue Recognition Policy
items.description: ASC 606 compliance documentation and revenue recognition methodology

items.name: ARR/MRR Analysis
items.description: Annual and monthly recurring revenue breakdown by customer cohort

items.name: Customer Cohort Analysis
items.description: Revenue retention and expansion by customer cohort over time

items.name: Deferred Revenue Schedule
items.description: Breakdown of deferred revenue by customer and contract

items.name: CAC/LTV Analysis
items.description: Customer acquisition cost and lifetime value calculations by segment

items.name: Burn Rate and Runway
items.description: Monthly cash burn analysis and projected runway

items.name: Certificate of Incorporation
items.description: Current certificate of incorporation and all amendments

items.name: Cap Table
items.description: Fully diluted capitalization table with all options, warrants, and convertibles

items.name: Material Contracts
items.description: All contracts with value >$100K or strategic importance

items.name: IP Assignment Agreements
items.description: Employee and contractor IP assignment agreements

items.name: Customer Contracts (Top 20)
items.description: Master agreements and order forms for top 20 customers

items.name: Vendor Contracts
items.description: Key vendor and supplier agreements

items.name: Litigation Summary
items.description: Pending and threatened litigation matters

items.name: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
items.description: Current customer-facing legal documents

items.name: System Architecture Diagram
items.description: High-level architecture showing all systems and integrations

items.name: Technology Stack Documentation
items.description: Languages, frameworks, databases, and infrastructure used

items.name: Source Code Repository Access
items.description: Access to version control system (GitHub, GitLab, etc.)

items.name: Infrastructure Documentation
items.description: Cloud infrastructure, hosting, and DevOps setup

items.name: Security Certifications
items.description: SOC 2, ISO 27001, or other security certifications

items.name: Penetration Test Reports
items.description: Most recent security assessment and penetration test results

items.name: Technical Debt Assessment
items.description: Known technical debt items and remediation plans

items.name: API Documentation
items.description: External and internal API documentation

items.name: Organizational Chart
items.description: Current org chart with reporting relationships

items.name: Employee Census
items.description: Full employee list with roles, departments, start dates, and compensation

items.name: Employee Agreements
items.description: Standard employment, confidentiality, and non-compete agreements

items.name: Benefits Summary
items.description: Employee benefits including health, 401k, and equity plans

items.name: Key Person Dependencies
items.description: Analysis of critical knowledge holders and succession plans

items.name: Office Leases
items.description: Real estate lease agreements and terms

items.name: Insurance Policies
items.description: D&O, E&O, cyber, and general liability policies

items.name: Customer List
items.description: Complete customer list with contract values and renewal dates

items.name: Sales Pipeline
items.description: Current sales pipeline and forecast

items.name: Churn Analysis
items.description: Historical churn data and reasons for customer losses

items.name: Pricing Documentation
items.description: Current pricing models, rate cards, and discount policies

items.name: Competitive Analysis
items.description: Market positioning and competitive landscape analysis

items.name: Marketing Materials
items.description: Current marketing collateral and brand guidelines

items.name: Partner Agreements
items.description: Channel partner, reseller, and integration partner contracts
